name: stock-market-sentiment-agent
description: AI-powered sector-first sentiment analysis platform for small-cap traders

scripts.backend:dev: python -m uvicorn main:app --app-dir backend --reload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000 --reload-dir backend --reload-exclude frontend --reload-exclude node_modules --reload-exclude market_sentiment
scripts.dev:clean: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$listenerPid=(Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 8000 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -Expand OwningProcess -Unique); if($listenerPid){ Stop-Process -Id $listenerPid -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host 'Killed PID ' $listenerPid ' on port 8000' } else { Write-Host 'No listeners on port 8000' }"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/__pycache__ backend/.pytest_cache
